item.description: Resume/CV Angel Garcia J. 702-960-9278 angel.garcia0616@icloud.com Company Role Time Period Free Cyber Clinic Training Program Developer & Co-Founder October 2021 - Now Assess threat actor Tactics, Techniques and Procedures (TTPs) focused on the 100s of small businesses under the Small Business Development Center to minimize the attackersâ€™ impact. Create virtual labs accessible through Apache Guacamole to be assessed with open-source & system tools to train for vulnerabilities or weaknesses found in small businesses.
